roleset.name: make putrid
roleset.note: PUTREFY-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: ferment (45.5), fade (45.4), edited by hwangd. Member of VNcls entity_specific_cos-45.5, other_cos-45.4. (from putrefy.01-v)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: The virus putrefies the insides of an infected individual.
example.arg: the insides of an infected individual

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: In that atmosphere, animal flesh putrefies.
